metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

properties.displayName: Ensure Function app is using the latest version of TLS encryption
properties.description: Please use /providers/Microsoft.Authorization/policyDefinitions/f9d614c5-c173-4d56-95a7-b4437057d193 instead. The TLS(Transport Layer Security) protocol secures transmission of data over the internet using standard encryption technology. Encryption should be set with the latest version of TLS. App service allows TLS 1.2 by default, which is the recommended TLS level by industry standards, such as PCI DSS
